data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - JDB: Classical Adventure
data.detailed_description:
Nothing beats that classic fantasy feeling found in many role playing games.

Created by JDB Artist, the musician behind the wildly popular Inspirational series, JDB: Classical Adventure includes music tracks, background sounds and short themes perfect for fanfares, victories and inns. Whether you're wanting to recreate that nostalgic feeling or want to spice up your game's soundtrack, JDB: Classical Adventure is the pack for you!

This pack contains:

  • 22 BGM tracks, with music for battles, dungeons, towns and more.
  • 14 thematic background sounds.
  • 13 ME tracks for victories, fanfares, defeats and more.
  • OGG, MP3 and WAV formats for use in RPG Maker VX-Ace.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker projects.

Tracklist:

1 - Battle 1
2 - Battle 2
3 - Battle 3
4 - Boss 1
5 - Boss 2
6 - Boss 3
7 - Christmas- A Mysterium
8 - Dungeon 1
9 - Dungeon 2
10 - Dungeon 3
11 - Field 1
12 - Field 2
13 - Field 3
14 - Friendly Ghosts
15 - Frozen Deep in Ice
16 - Hall of Kings
17 - Inn 1
18 - Inn 2
19 - Suspicious Town
20 - The Abyss
21 - The Church
22 - The Promise

data.short_description: Go back to the classics with this versatile and complete music and sound pack
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
